title: Is there an estimate of when server transfer will be available again?
body:
As the title states (probably mostly for Riot employees), can you say anything about when server transfers are up and running again? 
Are we talking days, weeks?  {{summoner:13}}

replies.body: I don't have an ETA on when transfers will be enabled again, friend. I'd hate to speculate and be wrong, so I'd recommend you keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for an announcement about their re-enable.
